problem.markdown:
1. Flow –head relationship for venture meter is.
(x) nonlinear () cannot say () linear
2. Which one of the following is a variable area meter??
() venturimeter () Pitot tube (x) Rotameter () orificemeter
3. Constant coefficient of discharge for venturimeter connected to 2 to 8’ pipe diameters is approximately around?
() 1 () 0.6 (x) 0.98 () 0.2
4. Diff. Pressure created by a venture tube is
(x) directly propotional to the flow rate () directly propotional to square of flow rate () inversely propotional to square of flow rate () inversely propotional to the flow rate
5. Venturimeter can be used for measuring the flow rate of
() gasses only (x) both for liquids and gases () liquid only
problem.p: 1. Flow –head relationship for venture meter is.
2. Which one of the following is a variable area meter??
3. Constant coefficient of discharge for venturimeter connected to 2 to 8’ pipe diameters is approximately around?
4. Diff. Pressure created by a venture tube is

choicegroup.choice: directly propotional to the flow rate
directly propotional to square of flow rate
inversely propotional to square of flow rate
inversely propotional to the flow rate

problem.p: 5. Venturimeter can be used for measuring the flow rate of
